description:
Speaker: Amber Brown

With asyncio on the scene, the question has been asked: is there any point in having Twisted or Tornado around?

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
title: The Report Of Twisted’s Death or: Why Twisted and Tornado Are Relevant In The Asyncio Age
